> 
> Yeah, I got it because it looked cool, but I never could find the patience to completely build anything (despite my 2-3 years playing minecraft)

It does take a very, very long time to make anything very large... but once you do, you never forget it. It's so satisfying to fly a brand-new ship around for the first time.

We better be able to orbit them.

And also: YES!!!!! I might actually want to play the game now! Now all it's missing is fuel tank and proper burning engines!

***"We need to come up with the advantages that players without helmets or suits would have - something that can only be done if the character has no space suit. Otherwise nobody will take off their helmet and the whole point of air in spaceships will be lost. Bite the bullet. Make the change.

Well, the obvious thing is if you don't have the suit you don't need suit energy. Whether that's a problem or not is a whole 'nother story.

> 
> It does take a very, very long time to make anything very large... but once you do, you never forget it. It's so satisfying to fly a brand-new ship around for the first time.

I've been able to build all my sci-fi designed ships in it (with exception to the mechanical/moving parts, as while it is in the game, it is more limited than my imagination).

For the game to allow that, is amazing. This is the largest ship I built:

![FBA6D7FE501564FEC2E3630A9FCA8BAA610AFD76](http://cloud-2.steamusercontent.com/ugc/902141055307313490/FBA6D7FE501564FEC2E3630A9FCA8BAA610AFD76/)

Based on this design:

![the_lion_sun__wip__by_techy_ben-d5p1k9r.jpg](http://th04.deviantart.net/fs71/PRE/f/2012/358/a/0/the_lion_sun__wip__by_techy_ben-d5p1k9r.jpg)

Lets just say I'm never going to have the time to finish the decks and crew quarters on that thing. It has about 6 frigate bays, countless cargo space, and 2 "cities" of crew cabins with the central command centre in the middle there. It's about 1km wide (or tall depending on orientation). Oh, but so far I do have the control rooms, the med bay, the landing pad, the service centre, the manufacturing/repair yard, the observation deck, and 2 nightclubs... ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
